entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 31 January 2023
